alert.note: Alert for Steuben (New York) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Binghamton (South Central New York and Northeastern Pennsylvania)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued August 20 at 8:09PM EDT by NWS Binghamton
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of north central Steuben County through 845 PM EDT... At 809 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Haskinville, or 10 miles northeast of Hornell, moving north at 20 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 30 mph and half inch hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Cohocton, Haskinville and Atlanta. This includes the following highway exits... Interstate 390 near 2. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.50 IN MAX WIND GUST...30 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Frequent cloud to ground lightning is occurring with this storm. Lightning can strike 10 miles away from a thunderstorm. Seek a safe shelter inside a building or vehicle.
